entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Southend Reindeer
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:29 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -25.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Southend 3:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: -25.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 53 %
Wind Chill: -35
Dewpoint: -32.0°C
Wind: NNW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
